contents.text: Welcome to Vonnda in San Francisco, where we revolt against mediocrity to create online experiences that truly resonate.
If you're interested in starting a new project with Vonnda, press 1 to choose that menu.
To speak with our strategy and design team, press 1 to choose that menu.
Please hold the line while we connect you with our strategy and design team. Your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: I need to schedule a strategy and design session for a new project.
I need to discuss branding and UX strategy for a new veteran support website.
Define the UX blueprint and design system guidelines for a new SaaS platform
I’m looking to start a new website and need to speak with someone about the overall strategy and design.
I’d like to consult the design team about creating an interactive platform for my physics experiments.

contents.text: To connect with our front-end and back-end development specialists, press 2 to choose that menu.
Please hold the line while we connect you with our development specialists. Your call is important to us.

navigationGoals: I want to speak with your development specialists about our upcoming web app.
I want to connect with your dev team to build a mobile app that links veterans to local resources.
Discuss API architecture and microservices implementation for our frontend-backend integration
I need technical help setting up my site’s front-end and back-end features.
I want to work with your developers on the front-end and back-end of my physics simulation web app.

contents.text: For existing client support and account inquiries, press 2 to choose that menu.
For project status updates and milestones, press 1 to choose that menu.
Please hold the line for project status updates. A member of our team will be with you shortly.

navigationGoals: I’m looking for a progress update and next milestones on my current project.
I’d like an update on the current status of my veteran outreach platform project.
Retrieve the latest sprint velocity and milestone completion status for my ongoing web application
I’d like an update on my ongoing project and to know the next steps.
I need an update on the progress of my commissioned physics website project.

contents.text: For billing, invoicing, and account questions, press 2 to choose that menu.
Please hold the line for billing and account support. Your patience is appreciated.

navigationGoals: I have a question about my latest invoice and account billing.
I need help clarifying my latest invoice and setting up a payment plan.
Review the billing breakdown and update my company’s billing contact details in the account portal
I have questions about my latest invoice and need help with my billing and payment.
I have a billing inquiry about my current physics app development invoice.
